sip_features.sip_feature:

RTL Updates:

HSDs:
1. 1504696477: "FWD TGP-LP RTL1.0 UPF - SBR - UPF vs RTL Mismatch on R etention element"
2. 1504694142: "FWD TGP-LP RTL0.8 SBR Invalid Clamp Value"
3. 1504691015: "Adding stuckat coverage steps in cfg/README.hdk"
4. 1406749369: "Enable the SGCDC flow through SBR Dynamo"
5. 1406742743: "Extend the "duplicate port" error message for LTE fabr ics to also specify the setting of MinGlobalSpacePID parameter"
6. 1406674901: "Relax a requirement that SOC customers are required to determine a correct value for the idlecnt strap"
7. 1504681990: "FWD [TGPLP] [SBR PICr23 sandbox 17ww44a] Spyglass_lp f ailed with egressfifo don't have isolation strategy"
8. 1406656546: "Ensure that clkreq is deasserted when PGCB is in PWRDN , for both syncronous and async routers"
9. 1406651010: "Remove SGDFT scripts override for RTR"
10. 1406615607: "SBR CDC update (combined HSD's for various CDC changes - refer comments)"

sip_speccons.sip_speccon:
HTML

Integration Notes:

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable CTECH library when synthesising the IP.

NOTE: CTECH_LIB_NAME must point to a valid synthesisable/behavior CTECH library when simulating the IP.

sip_specins.sip_specin:
HTML

This SBR release uses the "IOSF_SVC_2018WW06" version of SVC in IRR with constraints on hierarchical headers insertion.

For support file an HSD at SIP HSD

The Zircon scores are uploaded to the IPDS dashboard for the SBR IP at Zircon Scores
